channel.title: Projects on Applied Choice Research Group
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Applied Choice Research Group

item.title: Environment
item.description:
Our environmental economics research is characterized by interest in and focus on topics relevant for environmental policy. Recent research projects have focused on:

  • Water quality.
  • Ecosystem services.
  • Marine plastics.
  • Energy.
  • Forestry.
  • Outdoor recreation.
  • Agri-environment.
  • Conservation.

item.title: Health
item.description:
Our health economics research cuts across a wide range of topics relating to public health policy. Recent research projects have focused on:

  • Public involvement in decisions concerning the health care system.
  • Food choice and diet.
  • Well-being.
  • Prioritisation of health service innovations.

item.title: Consumer
item.description:
Our research includes a broad range of marketing and consumer topics. Recent research projects have focused on:

  • Food choice.
  • Wine choice.
  • Financial services.
